observation: Altair Technology – Bitcoin Mining Solutions – Bitcoin Miners, Parts & Accessories.  Skip to content Hashprice 82 USD/PH/day Avg fee per block 2.152 BTC Fee % of revenue 40.79 % Estimated Difficulty Adjustment 2.24 Estimated Adjustment Date April 24, 2024 66,864 USD ‹ › Home Shop Menu Toggle Miners Parts Accessories About Contact Us Resources Blog Firmware Log In Products search Search Main Menu For Miners, By Miners We are a Missouri based bitcoin mining company that’s building a one-stop-shop for all popular bitcoin mining hardware, parts & accessories. We also consult with mining farm operators and investors on design and maintenance of bitcoin mining farms. ASIC Miners SHOP NOW Control Boards, PSUs & more Cables,  PDUs & more Featured Miners Select options Quick View MicroBT Whatsminer M60 series $ The Urlacher Loki Rigs Bitmain Antminer S19k Pro Bitmain Bitaxe Single ASIC Solo Miner Bitaxe GekkoScience Compac F USB Stick 220-400 GH Bitcoin miner GekkoScience Featured Parts Add to cart Njord Cloudline ePIC UMC Universal Mining Control Board V4 & Firmware for Antminer S19/S21 Antminer 120mm replacement fan Bitmain Antminer S19j/S19J Pro BeagleBone Control Board MicroBT Whatsminer M20S / M30S / M50S 140mm 350cfm fan with square plug Whatsminer WhatsPower P221/P222 Power Supply Global Partners US Based – Globally Connected Located in St. Charles, Missouri Fast Worldwide Shipping Worldwide shipping from our Missouri warehouse. Secure Checkout Secure SSL checkout and multiple payment options. Bitcoin Accepted We love bitcoin & offer additional discount for bitcoin payments Customer Support We help customers with troubleshooting & technical support. 14-day Warranty All our items are covered by Altair warranty Customer Testimonials Previous I just wanted to say that @altair_tech August 16, 2023 SHOUTOUT to pic.twitter.com/mQV3PMZyNz November 2, 2023 Excited to get some ePIC UMC’s integrated into a few of the newly supported miners. Shoutout to #bitcoinmining October 12, 2023 Props to a very smooth experience with the team at pic.twitter.com/tWUIsMBDAp June 8, 2023 Yeah buddy! New gadgets from @ePICBlockchain pic.twitter.com/whYN9yVhD6 Up and hashing on the s19j pro 104T. Thanks pic.twitter.com/OpMuJBA3Eq May 16, 2023 Shout out to @BraiinsMining #Bitcoin Shipped almost instantly and was packaged with extra care. Thanks pic.twitter.com/wNYxl2mJN7 Packed and ready for an amazing @LuxorTechTeam firmware campaign in Latin America. pic.twitter.com/QagmgFxU7u Next “Gold mining is a waste, but that waste is far less than the utility of having gold available as a medium of exchange. I think the case will be the same for Bitcoin. The utility of the exchanges made possible by Bitcoin will far exceed the cost of electricity used.” Satoshi Nakamoto Shopping Cart Altair Technology LLC 12747 Olive Blvd #300A St. Louis, MO 63141 (636) 206-6153 Account Cart Information Return & Refund Policy Shipping Information Terms & Conditions Stay in Touch Subscribe for updates, deals & more Leave this field empty if you’re human: © 2021- 2024 Altair Technology® We Accept Follow Us Scroll to Top This site uses cookies to provide you with more responsive and personalized service.
